references.paper_title: Hawkes model for price and trades high-frequency dynamics
references.reason: This paper is foundational for applying Hawkes processes to high-frequency financial data, a significant application area for point processes.

references.paper_title: Spectra of some self-exciting and mutually exciting point processes
references.reason: This paper introduced Hawkes processes, a fundamental model in point process theory and the basis for many subsequent studies.

references.paper_title: Estimation of non-normalized statistical models by score matching
references.reason: This paper introduced the score matching method, which is central to the proposed WSM estimator.
This book is a standard reference on Poisson processes, providing fundamental background for understanding point process theory.

references.paper_title: Space-time point-process models for earthquake occurrences
references.reason: This paper is a seminal work on applying point processes to seismology, a key application area demonstrating the power of point process modeling.
